cms.webpart.WebPartDescription: Displays an image, heading and text description according to the step currently selected in the connected Wizard layout web part.
cms.webpart.WebPartDocumentation:
Typically, the web part will be placed into the zone generated at the top of the Wizard layout if its Use automatic header property is disabled. However, it can be added anywhere on the page containing the wizard and it will connect automatically.

If you wish to display different header content for each step, it is necessary to enter it through the Custom step headers/icons/descriptions properties of the main Wizard layout web part. In this case, the Wizard header will load the given values and display them for the appropriate steps.

properties.fielddescription:
Specifies the text displayed in the main heading. You may enter the {0} expression to dynamically get the number of the current step and {1} for the total step count.
It is possible to override this value for individual steps through the 'Custom step headers' property of the Wizard layout web part.

May be used to select an image to be displayed at the top of the header.
It is possible to override this image for individual steps through the 'Custom step icons' property of the Wizard layout web part.

Specifies the description text shown in the header.
It is possible to override this value for individual steps through the 'Custom step descriptions' property of the Wizard layout web part.
